Package ru.clevertec.auth.service.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ru.clevertec.auth.service.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInnerService, UserViewService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserInnerService, UserViewService
Implementation of user services, handling core user operations such as retrieval, creation, and updating of user records. This class interacts with the UserRepository to perform database operations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergey Leshkevich

    • updateUser

      public UserResponse updateUser(Long id, UserRequest user)
      Updates a user's information based on the provided UserRequest object.
      Specified by:
      updateUser in interface UserViewService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to update.
      user - the UserRequest object containing the new user information.
      Returns:
      the updated UserResponse DTO.
      Throws:
      ru.clevertec.exceptionhandlerstarter.exception.UniqueUsernameException - if the username is already taken by another user.
